name: Trench marked & dug in correct location
Correct cable cover & danger tape installed
Ducting starts & stops / comes up wall in correct location
Ducting in back filled & compacted correctly
Pits installed in correct location & to height
Ducting sealed around as they enter & exit each pit
Ducting entering Light Pole cages Correctly
Pole light cages & foundations installed correctly
Correct Flush Boxes Installed (plastic, fire including pad, acoustic)
All Bonding cables installed (check metal benches & appliances)
Cat wires installed correctly (approved fixing positions)
Circuits clearly labelled on both ends of each cable
Separation between Data and Power at 300mm or as specified
All cables secured via cable ties with ends cut
Downlights cut into gib in correct locations
Correct Anchors used fixing to Ceiling / Walls
Fixings installed in wall correctly if board is wall mounted
All clearances sighted to ensure location is compliant
All cables correctly installed in protection device and earth and neutral bars and fully secured
All earths and neutrals labelled to match phase numbers
Switchboard is clean on the inside and outside
Feisst label on the door installed
Switchboard has all gaps sealed to meet fire standards
Correctly installed with terminations all secured properly
